General.Name: Fwusow Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Fwusow Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of animal feeds, consumable foods, cooking oils, soy flour, processed barley products, grain cereals, and organic fertilizers in Taiwan. It offers vegetable, peanut, sunflower, olive, palm, and sesame oils; bonito food products; cereals; dog and cat foods; and aquarium fish, Koi, bird, animal, duck, pig, poultry, and other feeds. The company also provides organic, biotech, instant water soluble, liquid, and gardening fertilizers, as well as organic compound compost products and substrates. In addition, it is involved in the eco and contract farming activities. Fwusow Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1920 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

1.Name: Ms. Jan-Hui  Dai
